name: Routed: Ride Share Sim (Beta)
description:
Routed A ride share simulation game.

Grow your fleet, manage their routes and race to pick-up riders in this ride-share simulation game. 🚕 🚕 🚕  How long can you last before your rating hits zero? 📱🎮

Start with a single car and attempt to deliver as many passengers as possible. Earn cash and points for each passenger you deliver.  As your earnings increase you'll gain access to upgrades to your fleet, and with each happy passenger delivered you'll get one step closer to unlocking a new car and growing your fleet!

Watch out though, as the popularity of your ride share grows. You'll have to make haste in order to pick everyone up in time! Passengers won't wait around for you to pick them up forever.

How long can you last, how far can you go, and more importantly how much can you make? Your scores are tracked on each map, can you beat your best?

Routed is currently in Beta. So, there might be bugs/issues. We welcome you to join our discord community and give feedback: http://discord.gg/dMF2cqB
